channel.title: [GIMP] GIF User bar [UPDATED]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made this GIF userbar in GIMP. I am planning on making six separate ones for each rank and it takes me quite awhile to make one. So this is kind of the "beta" of the userbars. Tell me what needs to be improved on, and if they look good enough to spend my time making. So just tell me what you think of it.
*NOTE* You may have to refresh the page because the animation is only played once.
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2m64kua.gif[/img]

item.title: [GIMP] GIF User bar [UPDATED]

item.description:

Thanks man. I’ll make a new thread once they’re all complete. They are taking awhile and I haven’t had a couple free hours to work.
